response.overview: Reconstructing matter as having dynamic agency between a structuralist loop and a quote, this analogue short is a tribute to Donna Haraway and her seminal "Staying with the trouble", evoking women labour in the knitted content of the textual image: the frame depicts women hands knitting and is manipulated and scratched with knitting needles by my own hands. The nature of matter itself is a problem for women (for feminist theory). Thus this is a non-camera film, realized with anonymous found footage, which I hope suggests that knowledge is indeed an embroidered fragmented dynamic multi layered and embedded quilt, as much as matter.
response.title: It matters
